svg.text: NFT Minting Transaction in Remix IDE
Step 1: Setting Up NFT Mint Transaction
• Contract has been deployed to the Remix VM environment
• The mintNFT function requires two parameters:
1. recipient: A wallet address (0xAbB483F64d9C6d1EcF9b8d49...)
2. tokenURI: Metadata link (https://example.com/metadata/)
The transaction is sent by the contract owner, so no payment is required.
Step 2: Transaction Execution
• Transaction hash: 0x2554acede7fd541e023628320b81ca40e171cb0...
• Gas used: 140180 gas units (transaction cost: 121895 gas)
• Transaction status: Success (execution succeeded)
• Block number: 2
The green checkmark indicates successful transaction execution on the blockchain.
Step 3: Emitted Events & Transaction Logs
• The transaction emitted two events:
1. Transfer: NFT transferred from zero address to recipient (standard ERC-721 event)
2. MetadataUpdate: Records the setting of token metadata URI
• Decoded output shows token ID: 0 (first NFT minted)
• The Return Value "0" confirms the token ID returned from the function
Transaction logs provide transparency and allow dApps to track blockchain events.
Ethereum Smart Contract Portfolio - Michael Bennett
